label.name: Free textbook: University Physics, Volume 1, Opens...
label.intro:
Free textbook: University Physics, Volume 1, Openstax college.

This is not a great textbook, but it has the virtue of being free.  If you just want a supplement to the video lectures (which are our main "textbook") or just want a source of sample problems to try when you are studying it is OK.  See the course outline for other textbook recommendations but note that our main source is the videos, so you don't need a textbook.  Note that on the Openstax site if you create an account (free) there is a Student Solutions manual that you can download.
